info.title: CareTrack API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the CareTrack backend application. To access protected endpoints, click the 'Authorize' button and enter your JWT token.

requestBody.description: Dynamic map containing patient fields to update

schema.description: Map containing any combination of patient fields to update

requestBody.description: Dynamic map containing doctor fields to update

schema.description: Map containing any combination of doctor fields to update

Bearer Authentication.description: Enter your JWT token in the format: your-jwt-token
Bearer Authentication.name: Bearer Authentication
